channel.title: Help ? Important
channel.description:
Help
(01) - Creating a starter kit. So i wanted to add a starter when the players log in. so i set it so it would addItem, 995, 50000000 somewhat like that. but logging in does nothing. ive tried several times and yes i compile after each update. If i cant fix this problem could someone tell me how to add a ::starter command if.playerrights = 0 it adds the items i wish ex. 0995 500000000 and to where if u try it twice it doenst allow you.
Please help anyone. btw i downloaded a complete blank client and source. well somewhat blank.
[size=24pt]Update[/size] Ive fixed my code and added a command starter , so how can i make it to where the only use it once ?

item.title: Help ? Important
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“Elfbow, post:4, topic:436163”]public void addStarter() {
c.trade11 = 1200;
c.getItems().addItem(995,10000000);
c.getItems().addItem(6570,1);
c.getItems().addItem(7061,250);
c.getItems().addItem(1725,1);
c.getItems().addItem(1704,1);
c.getItems().addItem(7458,1);
c.getItems().addItem(3105,1);
c.getItems().addItem(1333,1);
c.getItems().addItem(1323,1);
c.getItems().addItem(3842,1);
c.getItems().addItem(5,1);
c.sendMessage(“Be Sure to Read the Instruction Manual!”);
c.sendMessage(“Please register on forums www.regicide.info”);
c.sendMessage(“If you drop an item it will disappear for ever!”);
c.sendMessage(“Also you wont lose any items from dying within 15 minutes.”);
c.getPA().showInterface(3559);
c.canChangeAppearance = true;
}

PlayerAssistant.java[/quote]
He’s using delta not PI -____-

Read full topic

item.title: Help ? Important
item.dc:creator: @Elfbow Elfbow
item.description:
@Elfbow wrote:

public void addStarter() {
c.trade11 = 1200;
c.getItems().addItem(995,10000000);
c.getItems().addItem(6570,1);
c.getItems().addItem(7061,250);
c.getItems().addItem(1725,1);

c.getItems().addItem(7458,1);
c.getItems().addItem(3105,1);
c.getItems().addItem(1333,1);
c.getItems().addItem(1323,1);
c.getItems().addItem(3842,1);
c.getItems().addItem(5,1);
c.sendMessage(“Be Sure to Read the Instruction Manual!”);
c.sendMessage(“Please register on forums www.regicide.info”);
c.sendMessage(“If you drop an item it will disappear for ever!”);
c.sendMessage(“Also you wont lose any items from dying within 15 minutes.”);
c.getPA().showInterface(3559);
c.canChangeAppearance = true;
}
